name: Pivotal-cards
body:
pivotal-cards
=============

Bookmarklet to print a Pivotal Tracker storyboard as index cards.

Forked from [Paul Downey's project](http://github.com/psd/pivotal-cards).

For more information and to try it out, see [the project page](http://rooreynolds.github.com/pivotal-cards).
tagline: Bookmarklet to print a Pivotal Tracker storyboard as index cards
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
